titles.title: A bill to approve the transfer of Yellow Creek Port properties in Iuka, Mississippi.
A bill to approve the transfer of Yellow Creek Port properties in Iuka, Mississippi.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Boxer without amendment. With written report No. 113-184.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 414.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Approves the conveyance of the Yellow Creek Port properties in the custody of the Tennessee Valley Authority (TVA) at Iuka, Mississippi, from the TVA to the state of Mississippi.
